ambient_Mine_Denver~1: This place is a little scary!
ambient_Mine_Denver~2: Grab what you need, I'll cover you.
ambient_Woods_Denver: I love the sounds of the birds here.
ambient_Town_Denver: I want to go somewhere else...
ambient_Town_Denver~1: Maybe Clint can make me a new sword...
fight_Denver~4: My sword will cut you in two!
